post:
Bacloud.com - OWN data center operator in Lithuania, Europe


Bacloud announces **RENEWED** Linux KVM VPS servers with NVMe drives! Brand new nodes: 2 x 2680v4, DDR4 RAM, 10 x NVMe [Intel P3600](http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/solid-state-drives/intel-ssd-dc-family-for-pcie.html) RAID6. We use SolusVM for VPS Reboot/reinstall and other features.


> Linux NVMe KVM server: 1 x vCPU  E5-2680v4, 2GB RAM + 2GB vSWAP, 20GB 100% NVMe disk space, 50Mbps unlimited, 1 IPv4 + 1IPv6 - $6.43/month! [Click here to configure and order](https://www.bacloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=109)
> 
> 
> Linux SSD OpenVZ VPS: 1 vCPU, 1GB RAM, 25GB real SSD disk space, 50Mbps unlimited, 1 IPv4 + 1 IPv6 - $5.70 /month [Click here to configure and order](https://www.bacloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15)

**DISCOUNTS!!! Save up to 20% on annual and up to 30% on biannual payments.**

<hr />

**Configure servers follow your needs! SAVE 17% on annual payments!**

> Bacloud green dedicated server: Intel Celeron G1840T ( G3260T, G3460T, i3-4130T and i3-4170T available for additional fee ) 8GB DDR3 RAM , 2 x 120 SSD or 2 x 1TB, 100Mbps unlimited, 1 IPv4 + 1IPv6, **permanent IPMI ( remote hands ) **- $37.50/month! Remove second SSD or HDD - $30.84 [Click here to configure and order](https://www.bacloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=99)

> E3-1230v2  8GB ECC DDR3 RAM , 1 x 120 SSD or 1 x 1TB ( Remove second drive ), 100Mbps unlimited, 1 IPv4 + 1IPv6, **permanent IPMI ( remote hands ) **- $45.84/month [Click here to configure and order](https://www.bacloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=98)

Build your own cheap dedicated server: https://www.bacloud.com/en/dedicated-server-builder

**If you need any custom solution, billing questions please request a quote: Sales@Bacloud.com or Skype: Andrius.Bacloud**
